DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate effect two different dos AZD9773 ( CytoFab™ ) versus placebo ventilator free day ( VFDs ) first 28 day start dose AZD9773 patient severe sepsis and/or septic shock , already receive appropriate standard care treatment sepsis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Efficacy Safety 2 Dosing Regimens IV Infusions AZD9773 ( CytoFab™ ) With Placebo Adult Patients With Severe Sepsis and/or Septic Shock
DOC.criteria: Adults first episode sepsis hospitalisation objective evidence infection require parenteral antibiotic . At least 2 4 SIRS criterion 24 hour organ dysfunction ( must include either fever OR elevate white blood cell [ WBC ] ) Cardiovascular respiratory dysfunction . Immunocompromising comorbidities concomitant medication : 1 . Advanced human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection ( CD4 ≤50/mm3 ) . 2 . Stage III IV cancer . 3 . Haemopoietic lymphoreticular malignancy remission . 4 . Receiving radiation therapy chemotherapy . 5 . Stem cell , organ bone marrow transplant past 6 month . 6 . Absolute neutrophil count < 500 per μL . 7 . High dose steroid immunocompromising drug . Concomitant disease : 1 . Deep seat fungal infection active tuberculosis . 2 . Cirrhosis portal hypertension ChildsPugh Class C. 3 . History chronic hypercarbia , respiratory failure past 6 month use home oxygen set severe chronic respiratory disease . 4 . Neuromuscular disorder impact breathing/spontaneous ventilation . 5 . Quadriplegia . 6 . Cardiac arrest past 30 day . 7 . New York Heart Association functional Class IV due heart failure disorder . 8 . Burns > 30 % body surface area . Medication allergy disqualification . 1 . Treatment antiTNF agent within last 8 week . 2 . Previously receive ovine derive product ( CroFab™ , DigiFab™ ) . 3 . Sheep product allergy allergy latex , papain , chymopapain .
